Package chat.com.lloseng.ocsf.server

Class ObserverOriginatorServer

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
chat.com.lloseng.ocsf.server.ObservableGameServer
chat.com.lloseng.ocsf.server.ObserverOriginatorServer
public class ObserverOriginatorServer
extends ObservableGameServer
The ObservableOriginatorServer is a subclass of ObservableServer that sends OriginatorMessage instances to its observers. This class should be used when the observers need to know the orginator of the messages received. The originator is null when the message sent concerns the server. Project Name: OCSF (Object Client-Server Framework)

Version:
February 2001 (2.12)
Author:
Dr Robert Laganière, Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, François Bélanger, Paul Holden
See Also:
com.lloseng.ocsf.server.OriginatorMessage
